pageDescription: Customize the application to your preferences
dataManagementDescription: Export, import, or delete your application data. Please perform these actions with caution.

unlocked.title: Default Currency Note
unlocked.description: The currency you select will be used as the base for all calculations and reports. After entering your first transaction, the currency will be locked and cannot be changed.

locked.title: Default Currency Locked
locked.description: The currency is locked to maintain data consistency. You can enter transactions in any currency - they will be automatically converted to your default currency. To change the currency, delete all data at the bottom of this page.

financial.autoCalcChomeshDescription: Automatically add Chomesh to all income.
financial.minMaaserPercentageDescription: Set minimum percentage for donation from all income

notifications.emailNotificationsDescription: Receive updates, notifications, summaries and reminders via email
notifications.autostartDescription: Recommended to get timely reminders, even if the app is closed.

importExport.exportDescription: Export all application data to a file
importExport.importDescription: Import data from a backup file

clearData.title: Clear Data
clearData.warningDescription: This action will permanently delete all your data and cannot be undone.

versionInfo.title: Version Information
versionInfo.description: Check for updates and view version details
versionInfo.upToDate: Your app is up to date!
versionInfo.autoUpdateNote: The app checks for updates automatically on startup. You can also check manually here.
versionInfo.offlineHelp: To receive an updated version without internet, please contact us: support@ten10-app.com
versionInfo.webVersionNote: Web version is always up to date. No manual updates needed.

balanceManagement.title: Balance Management
balanceManagement.description: Manage your opening balance and debts
balanceManagement.modalDescription: This allows you to set an initial debt or credit without affecting your income reports.

messages.invalidJson: Invalid file or not in JSON format.
messages.invalidStructure: Data structure in file is invalid or missing required fields.
messages.emptyFile: Selected file contains no data to import.
messages.importConfirm: Are you sure you want to import data from this file? This action will overwrite your current data with the data from the file. It is recommended to back up your current data first.
messages.importConfirmWeb: Are you sure you want to import data from this file? This action will overwrite your current server data with the data from the file. It is recommended to back up your current data first.
